original: n'a gi bhyo ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: n'a gi bhyo ra s'a dha nam /

original: de nas klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs ni /
analyzed: de nas klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs ni /
translated: Next, the practice of the nāgī called Infinite Mouths:

original: klu'i gnas su gong bzhin du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas bsnyen pa skyel ba'o //
analyzed: klu'i gnas su gong bzhin du sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas bsnyen pa skyel ba'o //
translated: In a nāga place, as before, one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times to complete the approach.

original: de nas tshes lnga la klu'i gnas su chu'i nang du zhugs la /
analyzed: de nas tshes lnga la klu'i gnas su chu'i nang du zhugs la /
translated: Then, on the fifth day, one should enter the water in a nāga place.

original: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa dang / 'o ma'i 'bras thug gis mchod pa byas nas sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa'i rjes la klu'i mtsho nas klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa dang / 'o ma'i 'bras thug gis mchod pa byas nas sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa'i rjes la klu'i mtsho nas klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having made offerings of perfume, flowers, incense, and so on, and milk-rice, after reciting the mantra eight thousand times, the nāga girls will quickly come from the nāga lake.

original: de la 'bras thug gi mchod yon phul te khams bde'am zhes kyang 'dri'o //
analyzed: de la 'bras thug gi mchod yon phul te khams bde'am zhes kyang 'dri'o //
translated: One should offer them the rice-milk oblation and ask if they are well.

original: de nas khyed kyi bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /
analyzed: de nas khyed kyi bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na /
translated: Then, if they say, “What can we do for you?”

original: bdag gi chung ma gyis zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bdag gi chung ma gyis zhes brjod do //

original: nyi ma re la 'dis nor brgyad brgyad ster ba dang / des dgra gang yin pa gsod pa dang slar gso nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma re la 'dis nor brgyad brgyad ster ba dang / des dgra gang yin pa gsod pa dang slar gso nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: and you will be able to kill and revive any enemy you wish.

original: klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: klu mo zhal mtha' yas ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the nāginī Anantamukha is complete.
